subject: [Radiance-general] RE: RGB colour conversion
body:
[First time post, I hope this works...]

This small walkthrough by Ian Ashdown might be of some use or interest.
It describes matching a paint chip sample with a color in the monitor's
gamut as well as correcting the gamma. Free registration required to
keep out spambots, as I recall.

http://www.agi32.com/forums/view_topic.php?id=585&forum_id=4

--David Smith
